title: Mark Levin Audio Rewind - 4/15/22
description:
On Friday’s Mark Levin Show, WJNO Radio Host Brian Mudd fills in for Mark. Twitter has implemented a poison pill to prevent Elon Musk from buying the company. Woke corporations like Twitter are willing to operate at a loss because they are down with the cause. Then, Justice Katanji Brown-Jackson rejects the notion of our rights coming from God. This implicit denial of God and creation is antithetical to our nation's founding documents. Was KBJ predetermined by Joe Biden's biologist in order to determine that she could be defined as a woman? Later, with cautious optimism, it seems that the case against the biggest fraud perpetrated on this country is inching towards justice being served. A trial for the Hillary Clinton campaign lawyer will move forward after a judge refused to dismiss the case brought by Special Counsel John Durham. Afterward, the border crisis rages on and Biden is all too eager to help. Our country has received more illegal immigrants during Biden's tenure than the population of 11 states. The CDC extended the mask policy on airplanes, but Title 42, which was enacted for health reasons, will end and the federal government doesn't care.  
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
